website_summaries.verdict: With its tartan panels and matching blanket, this budget-friendly backpack offers a more traditional picnic vibe in an easy-to-carry package. A cute, lightweight option for an intimate picnic for 2.
pros: Compact and well organized with a decent-size insulated food compartment
Comes with all the necessary components for a romantic picnic for 2
Extra zippered compartment for keys and other essentials is a convenient touch
Available in multiple colors and 2 sizes
cons: Accessories aren't the sturdiest or most attractive, but given the price and intended use, this isn't an issue for most

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: This price point makes this product worth it. This is not something you will pass down, but it is something you will use often. The material is medium quality, the eating items are low quality but light and useful. The cooling compartment is good and depends on your ice pack. We take lysol wipes to clean items after eating and to wipe the interior out. We bike with it every weekend.
customer_reviews.author: Florida HomeOwner

customer_reviews.title: Best Gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband as part of a Valentine's Day gift, and we both love it! I especially like that the blanket has a waterproof side. The storage area for food is not huge but there are only two of us so I do not see it being a problem. The food storage compartment has good depth but is not particularly wide (from front to back). Can't wait to go on a picnic!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tessa M. Hall

customer_reviews.title: Nice and compact
customer_reviews.text: Nice and compact. Wish it had a better insulated compartment though and bigger plates. Well constructed and durable. Check out their entire line before you decide.
customer_reviews.author: Cheap Junk Critic

customer_reviews.title: Was a gift that they loved!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for friends into the winery tours. Inspected it before I gave it to them and I thought it was very nice altho I had nothing to compare it to. Thhe recipients went nuts over it. End result they have something they really like and will use and I look like the friend of the year!
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Great and practical
customer_reviews.text: This was one of the coolest and practical gifts I have found. My bf and I go on a lot of outdoor adventures and decided to give this for him for Christmas. It was also a little bit for me also as I am with him every time we use it, haha. The materials of both the bag and its contents are superb. It came with everything as described. The insulated compartment in the backpack is spacious and will almost always fit what you need for a casual picnic. We were able to fit a wine bottle nicely on the side. The blanket size is a great fit as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Value!
customer_reviews.text: This Picnic Backpack was even bigger and roomier than I anticipated! The side wine bottle holder is clipped in and can be removed, and is also secured to the side of the bag by a strip of velcro. It also fits a good sized water bottle and is insulated. The blanket is the perfect size with a water-proof bottom. The only negative I have about the bag is that the insulated part for the food is narrow and tall, so it can be harder to fit in tupperware of salads, etc without having to place them in sideways and having your food slide about. It fits a lot though, and would be perfect for a hike!
customer_reviews.author: ilovebooks2201

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought as a gift for my girlfriend. She loves it. Plus the fact it came with everything for a picnic. We have used it and it was great.
customer_reviews.author: BBB

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price, not close.
customer_reviews.text: 2 stars is generous. The pack is ok, it's customized to hold plates, utensils, cups: Enough for two. Thus 2 stars. The plates, utensils, cups are complete rubbish. The plates are thin, cheap plastic that warped when we put hot food on them. And they were so hot you couldn't hold them. Some picnic. Seriously overpriced, at $10.00 maybe.
customer_reviews.author: glweotek

customer_reviews.title: Amazing setup, it is light weight and very durable
customer_reviews.text: Amazing setup, it is light weight and very durable. Great product for two people wanting to have a little romantic day hike picnic trip. I surprised my girlfriend with this one our first picnic together, it was a huge hit.
customer_reviews.author: Michael S

customer_reviews.title: Wedding gift.
customer_reviews.text: Gave as wedding gift, they love love love it!!! Everytime they use it, they text me and tell me how great a gift it is and where they used it this time. Has everything.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended

customer_reviews.title: Must have for picnic date!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this backpack!! I love the fact that you don't have to drag stuff around to have a picnic. It keeps the temperature for your food and wine perfectly (with ice pack inserted). The backpack is sturdy and comfortable. I wish I've gotten the 4 person backpack over the 2 person. I'd love to review the 4 person vs 2 person picnic backpack if I ever get the chance to compare and review. It has everything you need to plate and eat! Just bring food and wine and rest is in the backpack! The pack has enough space to fit food for 4 people and front pocket comes very handy.

product_meta.title: VonShef 2 Person Blue Picnic Backpack Hamper with Cooler Compartment Includes Tableware & Fleece Blanket
feature_bullets: Everything you need for the perfect picnic for 2! Includes 2 x stainless steel knives, 2 x stainless steel forks, 2 x stainless steel spoons, 2 x dinner plates, 2 x plastic wine glasses and 2 x cotton napkins

Extra essentials also included - 2 x salt and pepper shakers to keep your food seasoned, 1x cheese knife, a plastic chopping board to cut bread and cheese on and a handy bottle opener. Also comes complete with a blue 45 x 52 inches approx. fleece tartan pattern blanket with waterproof PEVA backing
Cooler compartment keeps food cooler and fresher for longer. Great for cold meats, sandwiches, cheese, fruit, dips and desserts
Features soft padded shoulder straps for comfort and a top-mounted carry handle
Size: L 12 x W 7.5 x H 16.3 inches approx.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars138 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
